post:
Hey LET,
 
 [VPN.sh](http://www.vpn.sh) here again with a nice little yearly offering for you. Grab yourself a VPN with **20GB** bandwidth that you're able to share across our **17 locations**, for just **£6/year** (equivalent to just under $9 USD).
 
___
 **Locations:**
 
 **20GB bandwidth across 17 locations**
 
>* USA x5 (Chicago, Los Angeles, New Jersey, Florida, Indiana)

>* Switzerland
>* Estonia
>* Iceland

**VPN Features**

>* PPTP

>* Ability to use on multiple devices (Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android and more)
>* We accept PayPal, Google Checkout and Debit/Credit Cards (Stripe)
___

**[Order: 20GB Package: £6.00/yearly recurring ($8.92 USD)](https://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&billingcycle=annually&promocode=LET6YEARLY) - [Order Link](https://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&billingcycle=annually&promocode=LET6YEARLY)**
